Title: Exempts certain income for the purpose of determining aid provided pursuant to public assistance programs
Summary: Exempts aid derived from funding from childcare stabilization grants, childcare desert funding, or other non-recurring funding, issued by the office of children and family services to childcare providers from income for the purpose of determining aid provided pursuant to public assistance programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง131-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to exempting certain income for the purpose of determining aid provided pursuant to public assistance programs
